data.lyric:
[ti:Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!]
[ar:Dean Martin]
[al:Heartbeat Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow! (Remaster) - Dean Martin (迪安·马丁)
[00:08.80]Oh  the weather outside is frightful
[00:11.53]
[00:12.10]But the fire is so delightful
[00:14.79]
[00:15.55]And since we've no place to go
[00:18.08]
[00:19.23]Let it snow  let it snow  let it snow
[00:21.76]
[00:22.54]It doesn't show signs of stopping
[00:25.32]
[00:26.21]And I brought some corn for popping
[00:28.89]
[00:30.09]The lights are turned way down low
[00:32.28]
[00:33.06]Let it snow  let it snow
[00:35.87]
[00:37.27]When we finally kiss good-night
[00:39.03]
[00:40.53]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[00:43.11]
[00:44.25]But if you really hold me tight
[00:46.62]
[00:47.91]All the way home I'll be warm
[00:49.95]
[00:51.15]The fire is slowly dying
[00:53.71]
[00:54.70]And  my dear  we're still good-bye-ing
[00:57.14]
[00:57.96]But as long as you love me so
[01:00.67]
[01:01.59]Let it snow  let it snow  let it snow
[01:04.36]
[01:19.70]When we finally kiss good-night
[01:21.58]
[01:22.97]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[01:25.43]
[01:26.29]But if you really hold me tight
[01:28.95]
[01:30.13]All the way home I'll be warm
[01:32.45]
[01:33.50]The fire is slowly dying
[01:35.75]
[01:36.90]And  my dear  we're still good-bye-ing
[01:39.25]
[01:40.63]But as long as you love me so
[01:42.78]
[01:43.65]Let it snow  let it snow  let it snow
data.trans:
[ti:Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!]
[ar:Dean Martin]
[al:Heartbeat Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:08.80]噢 屋外的天气真是冷的让人受不了
[00:11.53]
[00:12.10]还好壁炉中的火燃烧的正旺
[00:14.79]
[00:15.55]打这天气开始我们就无处可去
[00:18.07]
[00:19.22]下吧 那就继续下吧 这满天纷飞的醉人的大雪
[00:21.76]
[00:22.54]但这可并不意味着一切都将停止
[00:25.32]
[00:26.20]我已买了好些粟米回家做好吃的爆米花
[00:28.88]
[00:30.09]连这灯光也逐渐昏黄暗淡
[00:32.27]
[00:33.06]下吧 那就继续下吧 这满天纷飞的醉人的大雪
[00:35.87]
[00:37.27]最终你我拥吻互道晚安
[00:39.03]
[00:40.53]我相当不喜欢在暴风雪时外出
[00:43.11]
[00:44.25]但若你抱的我真的很紧
[00:46.62]
[00:47.91]那所有归家的路我都将觉得无比温暖
[00:49.95]
[00:51.15]噢 壁炉中的火苗渐渐熄去
[00:53.71]
[00:54.70]而你 我亲爱的 我俩还沉浸在道晚安的吻中
[00:57.14]
[00:57.96]那就像你爱我那般绵长久远
[01:00.67]
[01:01.59]下吧 那就继续下吧 这满天纷飞的醉人的大雪
[01:04.36]
[01:19.70]最终你我拥吻互道晚安
[01:21.58]
[01:22.97]我相当不喜欢在暴风雪时外出
[01:25.43]
[01:26.29]但若你抱的我真的很紧
[01:28.95]
[01:30.13]那所有归家的路我都将觉得无比温暖
[01:32.45]
[01:33.50]噢 壁炉中的火苗渐渐熄去
[01:35.75]
[01:36.90]而你 我亲爱的 我俩还沉浸在道晚安的吻中
[01:39.25]
[01:40.63]那就像你爱我那般绵长久远
[01:42.78]
[01:43.65]下吧 那就继续下吧 这满天纷飞的醉人的大雪
[01:48.13]
